description.value: When you cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Cloudkill], modify its duration to be sustained up to 1 minute, and modify its standard effect to include the following: The cloud doesn't move away from you each round. Once per round when you Sustain the Spell, you can move the cloud 10 feet in the direction of your choice.

source.value: Pathfinder Lost Omens: The Grand Bazaar
